description: Rarely available STRATA-FREE row home in sought-after Burke Mountain. Offering a bright + spacious layout, with 4 bedrooms + media room, 4 bathrooms & updates, including AIR CONDITIONING. Surrounded by lush greenery & nature, directly across from Queenston Park, this home offers an open concept plan with modern finishings throughout. The main floor, which leads out to a beautiful private yard with deck and garden, features a gourmet kitchen with SS appliances, dining area, spacious living room, fireplace & powder room. 3 bedrooms up, including the primary with spa-like ensuite & full bathroom. Spacious bedroom on the lower along with a full bathroom, laundry & recreation / media room which can serve as an additional guest bedroom. Great, family friendly neighbourhood.
